data.eml:eml: Water Authority Hollands Noorderkwartier is a Dutch waterboard. This waterboard has emerged in 2003 as a result of merging waterboard of 'Uitwaterende Sluizen' and waterboard Hollands Noorderkwartier together with five smaller waterboards, Het Lange Rond, Hollands Kroon, De Waterlanden, Groot-Geestmerambacht and water board Westfriesland. It manages an area of 197,000 ha and is situated north from the Northsea channel including the island of Texel.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl2,250 records (March 2018)
